title: 3 and Out - Teammates Throw Brees a Lifeline; Team Facility Training Camps; Kuechly's GM Track; Headlines; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Teammates Throw Brees a Lifeline; Team Facility Training Camps; Kuechly's GM Track; Headlines; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff looks at the massive backlash against Drew Brees for his comments about kneeling for the national anthem, why he should have read the room in this moment of national protest, and his teammates throwing him a lifeline by accepting his apology. He also discusses the NFL's decision to have teams hold training camps at team facilities, looks at some of the non-Drew Brees related headlines, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
